about_the_game:
In a future dominated by corporate might, the privatization of space exploration has opened the galaxy to those bold enough to seize it. As the CEO of a powerful off-world company sanctioned by the United Earth Government, your mission is to exploit uncharted planets and their resources, outmaneuver rivals, and expand your influence to every corner of the universe.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

THE THREE PHASES FOR A SUCCESSFUL INTERPLANETARY MONOPOLY :

Send out reconnaissance teams to discover the new planets. Uncover valuable resources, ancient alien life and ruins, and competitors activities using your versatile EVMs (EXTRA-VEHICULAR MACHINES)

Harness the resources you discovered while dealing with environmental hazards like deadly viruses, extreme radiation, and unstable atmospheres. Adapt your strategies to manage these challenges and maximize profits.

Establish your presence on these worlds through colonization, influencing politics, and battling insurgent groups. Secure your foothold against both human competitors and alien threats to ensure the long-term dominance of your off-world company.

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

  • Expansive semi-open worlds featuring numerous regions and planets to explore and exploit, each with intricately crafted environments.

  • A variety of threats await in these uncharted areas, including radiation that disrupts electronics and signals, extreme heat capable of melting steel, intense cold, gravitational anomalies, and more.

  • Multiple transportation options, including ground, sea, and low-atmosphere flights using EXTRA-VEHICULAR MACHINES (EVMs).

  • Realistic Ballistic mechanics and physics

  • Engage in dynamic tactical combat, with multiple ways to take down your enemies. Choose from a wide array of weapons and vehicles, from light recon scouts to heavily armed combat scouts. Additionally, leverage your company's resources, such as militarized EVMs, orbital tactical strikes, and other powerful tools at your disposal.

  • Rich, detailed lore where every artificial object has a purpose, with distinct manufacturers known for their unique traits, style, and design philosophy.

  • Evolving lore and gameplay based on the current in-game Solar System calendar (SOL); as time passes, competitors grow stronger, the government pass new laws, and players must adapt to avoid bankruptcy.

  • User-friendly, intuitive UI systems that vary depending on the manufacturer from which they come from.

  • Receive deliveries anywhere in the off-world colonies, from crates of ammunition to EVMs, at any time.

  • The ability to recruit staff across various departments—reconnaissance, logistics, security—to aid in managing your company effectively.

name: EXPLOITATION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A third person sandbox action-adventure tactical game that blends in tycoon mechanics. In Exploitation, you take the helm of a small intergalactic company, tasked in carving your path to becoming a galactic conglomerate in a universe where only the ruthless survive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
